title: New Moon
summary: A reset point that favors planting small, intentional seeds and noticing the subtler tone of the day rather than forcing clarity.

meaning.headline: A quiet reset that invites small, intentional beginnings.

frames.text: The New Moon marks a fresh start and is better for setting intentions than demanding immediate clarity.
Energy is subtle today—move with permission and keep new moves light.
This guarantees success for any new plan.

frictions: Pushing for instant answers or definition
Mistaking quiet for lack of progress
opportunities: Name one or two intentions to nurture
Start small actions instead of forcing completion
Listen for the tone shift rather than demanding signals

do: Begin gently: outline one or two priorities instead of many.
Create space for reflection before deciding.
Track what feels promising without locking it in.
avoid: Treating quiet momentum as a problem

reusable_lines.text: It’s a reset day—start small and let intentions breathe.

forbidden_claims: Predicting outcomes for any intention set today
Assigning fixed identities based on the lunation
allowed_framing: Observational: “energy is subtler; it’s a good day to seed ideas.”
Agency-forward: “you can choose small, intentional starts.”
Non-deterministic: “notice what wants to emerge without forcing it.”
